messages.messageBody:
I'll be sure to purchase 'Hagukure' when I'm out. The first moment I read it, is was a stellar book, however, i lacked the proper amount of money to make the buy.

---------------------------------
Don't pick lemons.

messages.subject: Thanks!
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to say thanks to the people who donated to the Samurai Archives fund to assist me in keeping all this stuff online. The official 2005 calculation
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to say thanks to the people who donated to the Samurai
Archives 'fund' to assist me in keeping all this stuff online. The
official 2005 calculation is 87.28% of the cost of the server, the
domain name, and the Delphi Samurai History forum has been covered by
donations. My Visa card thanks you. As for 2006... Yoroshiku!

http://www.samurai-archives.com/donate.html
